name: Open-Admin-for-Schools
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Open Admin for Schools is a School Administration Program.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<tr><th style="padding:0.3em;"><span style="font-size: 120%;">[\s]+Open Admin for Schools ([^\s]+)<\/span> [^<]+ Les Richardson<\/th><\/tr>[\s]+<\/table>)
(?-mix:<!--[\s]+#  Copyright 2001-(20[\d]{2}) Leslie Richardson[\s]+#  This file is part of Open Admin for Schools\.)
